{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Allied Telesis |model=AT-WR2304N |revision= |upc=767035192246 |ean= |asin=B002LMSCBO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/13/2008 |manuf_country= |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR97908003 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=allied |default_ssid_regex=^allied$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=manager |default_pass=friend |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.alliedtelesis.com/products/wr2304n-0 Product page]
:[http://www.alliedtelesis.co.nz/support/gpl/wr2304n.html GPL code for the AT-WR2304N] [http://www.alliedtelesis.com/sites/default/files/wr2304n_ds.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.alliedtelesis.com/sites/default/files/wr2304n_ug.pdf User's guide] Based on compiler flags in the GPL source available for this product.. as well as the probable Senao casing, Web UI and specifications of the unit, this device is assumed to be the [[EnGenius ESR-9752]]. The FCC ID of that product has been assigned to this entry. Relevant lines from the kernel .config file are below.. *'''CONFIG_RALINK_RT3052=y''' *'''CONFIG_RT3052_ASIC=y''' *'''CONFIG_RT2880_DRAM_16M=y''' *'''CONFIG_RT2880_FLASH_4M=y''' *'''CONFIG_RALINK_RAM_SIZE=16''' *'''# CONFIG_GIGAPHY is not set''' Per '''Allied Telesis''''s manual, the default SSID is '''allied'''. ==Images== File:Allied Telesis AT-WR2304N front.jpg|front of the unit [[Has images::external| ]]
